revised_title: A Simplified Method for Evaluating the Failure Loads of Plane Frames
tldr: This article presents a new method for evaluating the failure loads of plane frames without following the sequence of plastic hinge formation. Instead, the proposed method utilizes the elastic and plastic load-deformation characteristics of frames, including second-order effects. The theoretical validity of the method is studied, and comparisons are made with experimental observations on frames loaded proportionally up to collapse.
